title: Several major issues with balance
body:
This is just a list of a few things that are pretty obvious fundamental flaws in gameplay from my perspective.

1. Flash - This summoner spell totally breaks the game. One champ with flash can literally become a nightmare requiring 3-5 people to control. The ability to have getaways and gap-closers should be specific to certain champs not ALL champs.

2. Q, W and E abilities being able to completely negate one and possible even more R abilities. This is ridiculous. You mean to say a skill that costs 40 mana is more powerful that one that costs 100+ mana?? The only time a R ability should be negated should be by another R ability OR and item (Edge of Night, Banshee's Veil or Zonyas). Shit like Windwall and Unbreakable are pure bullshit blocking pretty much any projectile R ability.

3. Teleporting to minions - This is just so over powered. Teleport should pretty much only apply to Stealth wards, Control wards, Towers and Inhibitors.

1. The game was already balanced around masteries and they changed those.

2. You can't counterplay vs projectile speed. You may fire your ulti as a ashe or jinx and be windwalled or unbreakabled after firing it. 3. The teleport duration is not what I stated was the issue. I stated that the ability to teleport to a minion was broken. You failed to ready the questions accurately and decided to instead be condescending and arrogant instead of approaching them with an opened mind.
